title: Bangladesh floods: 'I have nothing left except my life'
description: Khudeza survived the worst floods in north-east Bangladesh for a century but millions are homeless.

title: El Salvador's abortion ban: 'I was sent to prison for suffering a miscarriage'
description: Elsy was sentenced to 30 years for aggravated homicide after losing her baby in a miscarriage in El Salvador.

title: The abortion clues that can hide on your phone
description: There are a number of concerns around data protection following the US Supreme Court's ruling on abortion.

title: Hong Kong: ‘We don’t know where the red line is’
description: China promised to protect democratic freedoms for 50 years but new laws have effectively silenced all criticism.

title: Ukraine war: Russian fashion designers feel sanctions bite
description: Designers at Moscow Fashion Week wonder how they can stay in business without access to imported materials.

title: Chris Mason: What is Boris Johnson's goal on Ukraine?
description: The G7 and Nato summits are focused on Ukraine - and the PM is seeking to emphasise the UK's commitment.

title: England v New Zealand: Tim Southee bowls Ollie Pope for 82 to give NZ early wicket
description: Watch as Tim Southee bowls Ollie Pope for 82 to give New Zealand an early wicket on day five of the third Test at Headingley.

title: Cavendish will not ride 2022 Tour de France
description: Britain's Mark Cavendish will not ride the Tour de France, despite equalling the all-time record for stage wins last year.

title: Plan to cut energy bills if you avoid peak-time use
description: Some households could get discounts for using less energy at peak times under National Grid's scheme.

title: Birmingham explosion: Woman found dead and man seriously hurt
description: The gas explosion completely destroyed one house and damaged others in north Birmingham.

title: Nato plans huge upgrade in rapid reaction force
description: Jens Stoltenberg said the increase followed a direct threat from Russia to European security.

title: Barristers walk out of courts in strike over pay
description: Dominic Raab urged barristers to agree the pay rise but there are concerns junior lawyers will still leave the profession.

title: Queen in Edinburgh for annual trip to Scotland
description: She is pictured smiling during a ceremony to mark the beginning of the Royals' week in Edinburgh.

title: Ukraine war: The price of freedom is worth paying, says Boris Johnson
description: Boris Johnson argues letting Russia "get away with" invading Ukraine would have "chilling" consequences.

title: Sir John Major calls contaminated blood scandal 'incredibly bad luck'
description: The ex-prime minister's description of the disaster drew gasps from families watching the public inquiry.

title: South Africa police try to unravel mystery of tavern deaths
description: Most of the 21 who died in the sudden and unexplained incident were teenagers, the police minister says.

title: Prince Charles: Cash donation reports checked by watchdog
description: The Charity Commission is looking at whether it needs to act over donations to Prince Charles' charity.

title: Adele Roberts: Radio 1 DJ reveals she's free from bowel cancer
description: The Radio 1 DJ wrote on Instagram to share the news, eight months after starting treatment.

title: England captain Eoin Morgan set to retire from international cricket
description: England's World Cup-winning captain Eoin Morgan is set to retire from international cricket this week.

title: Euro 2022: Which countries are playing and where?
description: The Women's Euro 2022 Championship is taking place in England from 6-31 July. Take a look at which teams are playing at which stadiums.

title: Glastonbury 2022: 11 weird and wonderful moments
description: Inflatable sausages, ear-splitting screams and surprise stars. All the moments you may have missed.

title: Manchester United: The pre-season challenges that face new boss Erik ten Hag
description: Pre-season looms for Manchester United and new boss Erik ten Hag will finally begin his journey as the club's fifth permanent manager since Sir Alex Ferguson retired in 2013.

title: Anorexia: Woman fears she may die without specialist treatment
description: Amy Ellis lives in Wales, but is trying to raise money to get the specialist treatment in England.

title: Why do so many devastating earthquakes happen in Afghanistan?
description: At least 1,000 people have died in Afghanistan's worst earthquake in two decades
